text:
Created attachment 29873
error_log

Hi All,

We have configured the apache as a reverse proxy server. When the user access the URL https://www.fomsa.co.uk it will redirect the request to the application server http://10.142.1.79:51000.

This has been configured in the SSl.conf on the defualt port 443. This is working fine.

We need an additional configuration on port 500. When a user access the URL http://www.fomsa.co.uk:500/forms/frmservlet?config=hpmis ?.....the request should redirect to the application server  http://10.142.1.190:7778/.

Please guide. PFA for the SSL and httpd conf files and error-log also.

Regards,
Mahesh.N.R
